content.prompt:
Directions: For each question in this part, you will hear a brief exchange between two people. From the four choices, choose the most appropriate remark that the Ô¨Årst speaker could make in response to the remark of the second speaker.

NOW GET READY FOR THE BRIEF EXCHANGE:

choices.label: Ja, ich habe es gestern schon abgeschickt.
Ja, wir holen es morgen bei dir ab.
Ja, Onkel Max hat das Paket bekommen.
Ja, die Adresse ist auch schon drauf.

unit.text: 5: Factors That Impact the Quality of Life

skill.text: Skill 1.A: Describe the literal meaning of the text.
